modName: Sexy Numidium Brass Goddess Follower in a Dress
summary: You've probably been feeling pretty empty and lonely while adventuring through Skyrim. You've tried the vanilla and custom waifus but just can't find a connection with them. Well, feel lonely no longer. You can now have the Brass Goddess as a marriageable follower. She is in a mini-dress too.
descriptionHtml:
You've probably been feeling pretty empty and lonely while adventuring through Skyrim. You've tried the vanilla and custom waifus and just can't find a connection with them. Well, feel lonely no longer. You can now have the Brass Goddess as a marriageable follower. She has a big gun because why not. 

She uses vanilla dwemer textures so any fancy dwemer textures you use will make her look all fancy too.

I originally made her 300 feet tall but turns out things get really glitchy when you make them that big, so she's been chipped down a bit. 

She can be found outside of Mzulft.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/4c8eozZ.jpg[/img]

Features:
-A 30 foot tall giant golden sexy goddess that you can marry
-The entire Dwemer race except Yaggy Baggy
-She's indestructible. If you want a chance at killing her, you're going to need your sexy Akulakhan follower.
-She uses mysterious dwemer tonal magic to fit through doors even though she's tall as some of the buildings she's trying to enter.
-Great if you're Thalmor.
-You get to marry the destruction of Mundus.
-She breaks reality by just walking around.


Credits:
Trainwiz - Bhruce Hammar's head and the idea for this mod
Mahty - Dwarven Rifle
Vicn - His meshes
author: GendunDrup
